mapper.select: SELECT ADD_ITEM_CODE ,ADD_ITEM_TYPE ,ADD_ITEM_NM ,SVC_SELL_PRICE ,SVC_BASE_PRICE ,ADD_ITEM_DETAIL ,ADD_ITEM_NOTICE ,SVC_TERM_TYPE ,SVC_TERM_UNIT ,SVC_TERM_NUM ,SVC_TERM_DATE ,CREATE_ID ,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CREATE_DT ,UPDATE_ID ,TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as UPDATE_DT FROM TB_GFN_ADD_ITEM WHERE ADD_ITEM_CODE = #{addItemCode}
SELECT count(1)+1 as cnt FROM TB_GFN_ADD_ITEM
